SELECT P.PRODUCTNO, P_PRICE, P_CDATETIME, P_UDATETIME, P_NAME, P_CONTENT, P_KIND, I_LIKE, C.NAME AS CATNAME, IMGSRC, MAINYN FROM mini_db2.T1_PRODUCT P LEFT OUTER JOIN mini_db2.T1_CODE C ON C.CODE = P.P_KIND AND C.KIND = 'CATEGORY' LEFT OUTER JOIN mini_db2.T1_PDIMAGE PI ON P.PRODUCTNO = PI.PRODUCTNO WHERE P_KIND = #{pKind} AND MAINYN = 'Y'
AND P_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY P_PRICE
ORDER BY I_LIKE DESC
ORDER BY P_CDATETIME DESC
LIMIT #{startNum}, 6

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM mini_db2.T1_PRODUCT P LEFT OUTER JOIN mini_db2.T1_PDIMAGE PI ON P.PRODUCTNO = PI.PRODUCTNO WHERE P_KIND = #{pKind} AND MAINYN = 'Y'
AND P_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY P_PRICE
ORDER BY I_LIKE DESC
ORDER BY P_CDATETIME DESC
SELECT * FROM mini_db2.T1_CODE WHERE KIND = 'CATEGORY' AND CODE != 'R'
